Thanks, Yunwei!

wmaethner commented on Issue #172

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Isaac Vetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Reinhard Egelkraut

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described and merge the Event Notifcation Errors section into the Event Notification section.

:+1: For: 7
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
